name: Crimson Rock Crab
description: A species of crab that dwells within crimson shells. They are the distant relatives of the Armored Crabs of Fontaine. Possessing a far more docile temperament than their Fontemer counterparts, these crabs display almost no aggressive tendencies.\nAfter settling in the Serenitea Pot, Rock Crabs retained their habit of dwelling in borrowed shells. They spend most of their time by the shore, as motionless and unassuming as a rock.\nFor reasons unknown, some animals that enter the Realm Within retain their peculiar appearance shaped by the force of kuuvahki. To help Tubby identify them, Paimon has thoughtfully given them new names based on said appearance...
